articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: US President Joe Biden tests positive for Covid
articles.description: The 79-year-old is experiencing mild symptoms and will continue to work, the White House says.
articles.content: The 79-year-old, who is fully-vaccinated and has twice received booster jabs, will isolate at the White House and continue to carry out all his duties, a statement said.
